name: Survivor Spy Prison Escape
description:
SURVIVOR: SPY PRISON ESCAPE
Be a trained secret agent and escape from max security Jail through strategy, Survive!

Survivor spy prison Escape is a third person shooter game. Having some immersive horrified 3D environments of the maximum security Prison, it lets you feel like a real enslaved prisoner. Jails are hard to escape especially when they are protected by an expert team of armed soldiers. But here you are a secret service intelligence agent and you have been caught by the enemy forces. You were attacked when you were asleep in your hidden place. Keep cover in the shadows for stealth operations behind the walls. Try to stay out of sight from evil forces in this escape mission. Become invisible as a ghost.
You have been trained to escape the jails and prisons in the toughest of conditions as you are a brave heart and have the stealth power. Now make plan and find out the passcode to the prisons. Once you escape the first Locker, you have the other layer of security to cross. Run from this pit hell and make a solid strategy. Shoot lights to walk shadow to shadow. Prisoners are looking up to you as most of them are prisoned illegally here.
You do not have any weapons to use except the stealth power. Spy the jail guards and fight them like ninjas and Kill them. Once you kill them you have their weapons and from there on you would get to the main get to escape. Forces are big in number and cameras are watching too. There is no point you could get caught as you have been trained on such skills. Kick them punch them and throw them.
You survive, and we promise to give you more rewards and promotions after you run from this pit hell! Good Luck !

Features
Real life sound effects
3D environment
Be a secret service intelligence agent
Stealth power to use
Escape radars
Fight the jail guards
Make strategy to complete the mission
Different interesting stages
Lock picking and door hacking game-play
Physical fight
